title: Can Soil Health Improve a Farmer/Rancher's Life Too?

subtasks: Research and plan no-till methods
Convert existing fields to no-till
Select appropriate cover crop species
Prepare soil for cover crop planting
Plant cover crops using farm equipment
Manage cover crop growth and maturation
Divide pasture into sections or paddocks
Install fencing and water access for grazing
Plan grazing rotation schedules
Monitor cow grazing activity and pasture recovery

tasks.task: Improve water infiltration and holding capacity
subtasks: Assess soil health and structure
Implement practices to increase infiltration
Monitor soil moisture levels and adjust practices as needed
Plan farm activities to optimize time use
Adjust schedules for no-till planting and grazing rotations
Streamline farm operations for better efficiency
Evaluate farm expenses and income
Determine return on investment for new practices
Explore market opportunities for cover crops or grazed livestock
